title: Under Construction!! Newly Renovated Studio Coming Mid September
map_address: 1925 Santa Paula DR. near St Louis Ave
app_fee: 45.00 for credit and screening. $250 holding Fee
posting_body: ['Under Construction!!', 'Newly Remodeled studio with a fresh interior and all new appliances waiting for you to call "HOME" .Why', 'wait!', 'Apply today.', 'This home features beautiful industrial Carpet and marble white/gray floor tiles throughout the home with a bright and airy bathroom and vanity area.', 'Brand new white cabinets and Granite countertops throughout the kitchen.', 'Modern ceiling fan installed in the living room.', ' The home also offers Climate controlled AC and Heater.', 'This Community is under New Management!', 'Parking available with on-site laundry.', 'We are currently updating the courtyard and offer a convenient resident portal to submit rent payments, service requests, and communicate with management online.', 'The Community is steps away from the famous Las Vegas Strip, public transportation and restaurants.', 'Come on home to a lovely community with Magnolia Circle LLC.', 'UNIT AMENITIES', 'Air conditioner, Carpet, Ceiling fan, Climate control, Courtyard, Linen closet, Mirrors, Pet friendly, Refrigerator, Stove and oven, Tile floors, Vaulted ceiling, Window coverings']
